title: PSA Doubling Time (PSADT) Calculator
desc: The PSA Doubling Time Calculator calculates rate of PSA doubling in prostate cancer (correlates with survival).

orgreference.text: Pound CR, Partin AW, Eisenberger MA, Chan DW, Pearson JD, Walsh PC. Natural history of progression after PSA elevation following radical prostatectomy. JAMA. 1999;281(17):1591-7.

other_refer.text: Patel A, Dorey F, Franklin J, Dekernion JB. Recurrence patterns after radical retropubic prostatectomy: clinical usefulness of prostate specific antigen doubling times and log slope prostate specific antigen. J Urol. 1997;158(4):1441-5.
NCCN Clinical Practice Guidelines in Oncology: Prostate Cancer.

data.evidence:
Prostate-specific antigen doubling time (PSADT) = ln(2) / x,

Where x = slope of the relationship between ln(PSA, ng/mL) and time of PSA measurement (i.e., ln(PSAn) - ln(PSA1) / time between PSAn and PSA1, where n refers to a measurement >1)

inputs.label_en: Time between PSA<sub>1</sub> and PSA<sub>2</sub> measurement
inputs.name: time2

inputs.label_en: Time between PSA<sub>2</sub> and PSA<sub>3</sub> measurement
inputs.name: time3

inputs.label_en: Time between PSA<sub>3</sub> and PSA<sub>4</sub> measurement
inputs.name: time4

inputs.label_en: A mood disturbance that is severe enough to significantly impair social or occupational functioning, or that requires hospitalization in order to protect oneself or others, or contains psychotic elements.
inputs.name: time5
